verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come to the Way the Truth and the Life
Come to your God, Come to the light
Come with all you are
And let Him make everything right

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come with your heart, come with your soul
Come with your life, let Him take control
over all you are
And let Him make everything whole

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He is all you want
In every life situation
He is all you need
In Him there is no condemnation

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
He's the Holy One
Yet He died for us on a cross
He's the Only One
Who gave Himself up for us

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
He is God above
Yet He came down to die for the sinner
He is God of Love
Became a looser, so we could be winners
